alert.note: Alert for Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 13 at 8:39PM EDT until June 13 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM EDT FOR NORTHERN ST. JOHNS AND EAST CENTRAL DUVAL COUNTIES... At 839 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Fort Caroline, or 7 miles north of Unf, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Ponte Vedra Beach, Jacksonville Beach, Atlantic Beach, Neptune Beach, Mayport and San Pablo. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
